${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:GainedHeight.NAME: Gained Height
${modID}:GainedHeight.DESCRIPTION: Reduces to zero at end of turn. Play a Height Finisher at end of turn.

${modID}:Acceleration.NAME: Acceleration
${modID}:Acceleration.DESCRIPTION: You draw one less card next turn. Gain !M! Focus.

${modID}:AMAZING.NAME: AMAZING
${modID}:AMAZING.DESCRIPTION: When playing 3 attacks in a single turn, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Athleticism.NAME: Athleticism
${modID}:Athleticism.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to 2 cards. NL Your debuffs decrease by !M!.

${modID}:BackSpinKick.NAME: Back Spin Kick
${modID}:BackSpinKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. This deals !M! additional damage for each orb you have.

${modID}:BlastOff.NAME: Blast Off
${modID}:BlastOff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E]. NL Increase this card's COST by 1 this combat.

${modID}:BlueBlur.NAME: Blue Blur
${modID}:BlueBlur.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, your first move will play twice.

${modID}:BlueTornado.NAME: Blue Tornado
${modID}:BlueTornado.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Add a Height to your hand.

${modID}:BouncePad.NAME: Bounce Pad
${modID}:BouncePad.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! Heights to your hand.

${modID}:ChangeFormation.NAME: Change Formation
${modID}:ChangeFormation.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Convert your Levels to Speed, Flight, or Power.

${modID}:ChangeFormationSpeed.NAME: Speed Formation
${modID}:ChangeFormationSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Convert all your Levels to Speed.

${modID}:ChangeFormationFlight.NAME: Flight Formation
${modID}:ChangeFormationFlight.DESCRIPTION: Convert all your Levels to Flight.

${modID}:ChangeFormationPower.NAME: Power Formation
${modID}:ChangeFormationPower.DESCRIPTION: Convert all your Levels to Power.

${modID}:ClawsUnleashed.NAME: Claws Unleashed
${modID}:ClawsUnleashed.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have a channeled Dark orb. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Crouch.NAME: Crouch
${modID}:Crouch.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust up to !M! cards in your hand.

${modID}:DashPanel.NAME: Dash Panel
${modID}:DashPanel.DESCRIPTION: Play !M! cards to the right of this card.

${modID}:DirectJump.NAME: Direct Jump
${modID}:DirectJump.DESCRIPTION: When you gain Block this turn, add a Height to your hand.

${modID}:DizzySpin.NAME: Dizzy Spin
${modID}:DizzySpin.DESCRIPTION: Randomize the cost of ALL cards in your hand for this turn. Apply Dizzy to ALL enemies.
${modID}:DizzySpin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Randomize the cost of ALL cards in your hand for this turn. Apply Dizzy to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Drift.NAME: Drift
${modID}:Drift.DESCRIPTION: Activate the passive effects of NL your orbs X * 2 times. NL (!D! times)

${modID}:DropDash.NAME: Drop Dash
${modID}:DropDash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust 2 cards. NL Gain 1 [E].

${modID}:EndlessBoost.NAME: Endless Boost
${modID}:EndlessBoost.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 Dexterity. NL Every turn, gain 1 [E].

${modID}:FireSomersault.NAME: Fire Somersault
${modID}:FireSomersault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If exhausted, add another Fire Somersault to your hand.

${modID}:FireTackle.NAME: Fire Tackle
${modID}:FireTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage to the attacker.

${modID}:FlagPole.NAME: Flag Pole
${modID}:FlagPole.DESCRIPTION: Add a Height to your hand. Channel a Frost for each Height in your hand.

${modID}:GrindRail.NAME: Grind Rail
${modID}:GrindRail.DESCRIPTION: Swaps the cost of adjacent cards for this turn.
${modID}:GrindRail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Swap the cost of two cards for this turn.

${modID}:HeavyBounceSlam.NAME: Heavy Bounce Slam
${modID}:HeavyBounceSlam.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all of your frost orbs. NL Deal 2x damage for each frost orb evoked.

${modID}:Height.NAME: Height
${modID}:Height.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Height. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HomingDash.NAME: Homing Dash
${modID}:HomingDash.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack is played twice.
${modID}:HomingDash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next attack is played twice.

${modID}:HomingAttack.NAME: Homing Attack
${modID}:HomingAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Height and a Trick to your hand.
${modID}:HomingAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 2 Heights and a Trick to your hand.

${modID}:LevelUp.NAME: LevelUp
${modID}:LevelUp.DESCRIPTION: If the last card played was an... NL Attack : Gain Strength NL Skill : Gain Dexterity NL Power : Gain Focus

${modID}:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
${modID}:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: Gain Vigor for every card in your Exhaust Pile.

${modID}:MyRainbow.NAME: My Rainbow
${modID}:MyRainbow.DESCRIPTION: Play the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:PowerRing.NAME: Power Ring
${modID}:PowerRing.DESCRIPTION: When you create a card, create one more.

${modID}:QuickAir.NAME: Quick Air
${modID}:QuickAir.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a Quick Step to your hand.
${modID}:QuickAir.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add an upgraded Quick Step to your hand.

${modID}:QuickStep.NAME: Quick Step
${modID}:QuickStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If this card is to the very right of your hand, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:ScissorKick.NAME: Scissor Kick
${modID}:ScissorKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal an additional !M! damage for each card in your hand.

${modID}:SecretRoute.NAME: Secret Route
${modID}:SecretRoute.DESCRIPTION: This turn, whenever you create or draw a card, upgrade it. NL Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Slide.NAME: Slide
${modID}:Slide.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your Discard Pile to the top of your Draw Pile.

${modID}:SonicBoom.NAME: Sonic Boom
${modID}:SonicBoom.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal damage to ALL enemies equal to your block.

${modID}:SonicFlare.NAME: Sonic Flare
${modID}:SonicFlare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Regain half the Vigor used.
${modID}:SonicFlare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! to ALL enemies. NL Regain half the Vigor used.

${modID}:SonicIsMyName.NAME: Sonic Is My Name
${modID}:SonicIsMyName.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Every time you play an attack card, activate the passive of effect of ALL your orbs.

${modID}:SonicWave.NAME: Sonic Wave
${modID}:SonicWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Evoke all of your orbs.
${modID}:SonicWave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Channel !M! Lightning. NL Evoke all of your orbs.

${modID}:SpeedUp.NAME: Speed Up
${modID}:SpeedUp.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack deals 8 additional damage. NL Gain 1 [E].

${modID}:SpeedBreak.NAME: Speed Break
${modID}:SpeedBreak.DESCRIPTION: Take 3 damage for every 4 cards played. All cards in your hand cost zero for this turn.

${modID}:SpinDash.NAME: Spin Dash
${modID}:SpinDash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Play the top card of your draw pile.
${modID}:SpinDash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Play the top card of your draw pile. NL It is upgraded for the rest of combat.

${modID}:SuperSonicForm.NAME: Super Sonic Form
${modID}:SuperSonicForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain !M! Focus.

${modID}:Taunt.NAME: Taunt
${modID}:Taunt.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Gain !M! Temporary Dexterity.

${modID}:Teaser.NAME: Teaser
${modID}:Teaser.DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Dark. NL Shuffle a Claws Unleashed into your Draw Pile.
${modID}:Teaser.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Dark. NL Shuffle an upgraded Claws Unleashed into your Draw Pile.

${modID}:TopKick.NAME: Top Kick
${modID}:TopKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Your next attack deals !M! additional damage.

${modID}:Trick.NAME: Trick
${modID}:Trick.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL If you already have Vigor, double it. NL If not, gain !M! Vigor. NL stslib:Refund 1. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TripleKick.NAME: Triple Kick
${modID}:TripleKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Temporary Strength. NL Add the second kick to your hand.

${modID}:TripleKick2.NAME: Triple Kick (part 2)
${modID}:TripleKick2.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Temporary Strength. NL Add the third kick to your hand.

${modID}:UpDraft.NAME: Up Draft
${modID}:UpDraft.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Add a Height to your hand.

${modID}:VolcanoSlider.NAME: Volcano Slider
${modID}:VolcanoSlider.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all to the left of this card. Deal !D! damage. Deals !M! additional damage for each card exhausted.

${modID}:WallJump.NAME: Wall Jump
${modID}:WallJump.DESCRIPTION: Add Height to your hand. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Repeat this X times.

${modID}:Windmill.NAME: Windmill
${modID}:Windmill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Randomize a card's cost in your hand for the rest of combat.

${modID}:DevCreateCard.NAME: Dev Create Card
${modID}:DevCreateCard.DESCRIPTION: Heal target for 999 HP. NL Lose 99 [E]. NL Gain 3 [E]. NL Add any card to your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This is not a card intended for players.
